text:
The following error message appears when the page-language is switched on the search results
page:

<!--Encountered "OR" at line 1, column 7.
Was expecting one of:
    "(" ...
  
 <QUOTED> ...
    <TERM> ...
    <PREFIXTERM> ...
    <WILDTERM> ...
    "[" ...at org.mortbay.util.ThreadPool$PoolThread.run(ThreadPool.java:534)

   ....
    
easy to reproduce on the zones as well.
creator: ragaller@apache.org
